zh: 包装与营销的系统化扩展
将品牌视觉系统延展到包装、营销与更多触点。
en: Extending the brand visual system to packaging, marketing, and more touchpoints.

zh: 当产品逐步进入市场，品牌视觉不再只存在于理想条件下，而需要在真实环境与多样场景中持续保持清晰与一致。
en: As products enter the market, brand visuals no longer exist only under ideal conditions, but need to maintain clarity and consistency across real environments and diverse scenarios.

zh: 包装被视为品牌系统的重要组成部分
en: Packaging is viewed as an important component of the brand system

zh: 在产品数量增加的情况下，通过统一的结构与视觉逻辑，确保包装在不同规格与信息层级中依然保持品牌识别。
en: As product numbers increase, through unified structure and visual logic, packaging maintains brand recognition across different specifications and information levels.

zh: 主视觉并非独立存在，而是从品牌系统中生长
en: Key visuals don't exist independently, but grow from the brand system

zh: 通过统一的视觉母题与规则，主视觉能够在不同传播场景中保持一致表达，同时具备灵活延展性。
en: Through unified visual motifs and rules, key visuals maintain consistent expression across different communication scenarios while having flexible extensibility.

zh: 在不同区域与传播语境中，视觉需要适度调整，但不失核心识别
en: In different regions and communication contexts, visuals need moderate adjustment without losing core recognition

zh: 系统的存在，使这些变化始终处于可控范围之内。
en: The system's existence keeps these changes within controllable range.

zh: 真实环境往往是不理想的
在不同光线、材质与空间条件下，品牌视觉仍能保持清晰与稳定，这是系统是否成立的重要检验。
en: Under different lighting, materials, and spatial conditions, brand visuals maintain clarity and stability - an important test of system validity.

zh: 这是整个案例的「可信度锚点」
en: This is the 'credibility anchor' of the entire case

zh: 线上与线下并非割裂的两个系统
en: Online and offline are not two separate systems

zh: 通过统一的视觉语言，品牌在不同触点中形成连续体验，而非碎片化呈现。
en: Through unified visual language, the brand forms a continuous experience across different touchpoints, rather than fragmented presentation.

zh: 在复杂应用与真实使用中，品牌系统保持了稳定结构与清晰表达
en: Under complex applications and real use, the brand system maintains stable structure and clear expression

zh: 这标志着系统不再只是设计成果，而成为可被持续使用的品牌基础设施。
en: This marks the system as no longer just a design outcome, but sustainable brand infrastructure.

zh: 随着系统逐步成熟，设计开始真正融入品牌的日常运作
en: As the system matures, design begins to truly integrate into the brand's daily operations

zh: 这一阶段的完成，也为后续品牌发展提供了稳定基础。
en: The completion of this phase also provides a stable foundation for subsequent brand development.
